original_text: So come, you people of the nations, you who have escaped from war. Bring yourselves in front of me together! People who carry wooden idols are fools! They pray to gods who cannot rescue them. So come, you people of the nations, you who have escaped from war. Bring yourselves in front of me together! People who carry wooden idols are fools! They pray to gods who cannot rescue them. So come, you people of the nations, you who have escaped from war. Bring yourselves in front of me together! People who carry wooden idols are fools! They pray to gods who cannot rescue them. So come, you people of the nations,
korean_text: 열방 중에서 피난한 자들아 너희는 모여 오라 함께 가까이 나아오라 나무 우상을 가지고 다니며 구원하지 못하는 신에게 기도하는 자들은 무지한 자들이니라

sentences.original_text: So come, you people of the nations
you who have escaped from war
Bring yourselves in front of me together
People who carry wooden idols are fools
sentences.korean_translation: 나무 우상을 메는 자들은 어리석은 자들이다

sentences.original_text: They pray to gods who cannot rescue them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들을 구원하지 못하는 신들에게 기도한다
